channel.title: loreatec on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in loreatec on Barefoot Rob

item.title: new battery for Macbook (again)
item.description: 10:34 Sunday 14 April 2019 JST I am on the way back from Loreatec with another new battery in my computer. I replaced it back in December or so, but it never really acted right. Hopefully this one will do the right things. Lantz offered this battery at no cost after I tried to pay him. We settled on half price. 10:40 Sunday 14 April 2019 JST Battery has gone from 36 to 31 percent in a few minutes.

item.title: new battery and fans
item.description: 18:30 Monday 03 December 2018 JST Thanks to Lantz for replacing the battery and both fans in just 30 minutes at Loreatec. (30 minutes after waiting a week for parts to be shipped) Machine works and is back to being quiet. yay!
